channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Stop Spam Comments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Stop Spam Comments

item.title: CVE-2022-1663|2024-08-03T00:10:03.842Z -- unknown -- stop%20spam%20comments
item.description: The Stop Spam Comments WordPress plugin through 0.2.1.2 does not properly generate the Javascript access token for preventing abuse of comment section, allowing threat authors to easily collect the value and add it to the request.
